name: Forkin Around
description:
Forkin Around is a breath of fresh air in the forklift game scene. Complete orders in a magnificent warehouse full of wares. Incredible box physics and MORE!

UI IS MADE FOR 1920:1080 RESOLUTION

**Controls:**

- WASD - Driving around
- Space - Drop your boxes
- Left Click - Throw your top box
- Shift - Boost (unlocked during the game)

Follow the lines to find the drop zones, have fun!

Thank you for playing!

PATCH NOTES:
Build2
- Fixed a bug with palletes
